title: Chill Art Watch Faces
description: Chill Art is a collection of relaxing and funny watch faces for your Android Wear device.Features:• support both round and square watches• support ambient mode• peek cards visible in ambient mode too• optimized for LG G WatchIf you have any issue please don't hesitate to contact me at riccardo.manoni@gmail.com (English or Italian language) I will work on fixing it, thanks.I'm working to provide setting options in future update, stay tuned!
descriptionHTML:
Chill Art is a collection of relaxing and funny watch faces for your Android Wear device.

Features:
• support both round and square watches
• support ambient mode
• peek cards visible in ambient mode too
• optimized for LG G Watch

If you have any issue please don't hesitate to contact me at riccardo.manoni@gmail.com (English or Italian language) I will work on fixing it, thanks.

I'm working to provide setting options in future update, stay tuned!
